main.name: Luke J. Snyder
main.bio: Dynamic software engineering professional recognized for being a highly detailed problem-solver. Thrives in fastpaced environments and able to work independently in a high degree of ambiguity. Experience working with C-Suite level executives and board members.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Software Engineer, Milford, OH
description1: - Assisted a team to identify a problem that caused consumers to receive free products totaling ~$5 million per day.
description2: - Personal project which reduced IT support tickets by 12% and was nominated for TCS Northern American division
description3: - Provided support and order fulfillment for 3 rd party vendors one being Instacart
description4: - Worked with offshore and onsite developers to renovate a web-based application for online Curb Side Pickup
description5: - Created an order tracking system that provided customers the ability to see their order(s) being fulfilled in real time
description6: - Troubleshooted and assisted with the deployment of new handheld technology to replace legacy devices

work.title: Information Technology Intern, Cincinnati, OH
work.description1: - Provided and developed IT solutions for the CFO, board of directors and senior level executives; Troubleshot issues for various software including Windows 10 and Microsoft Office suite
work.description2: - Completed the setup and configuration of over 400 iOS, Windows and IOT devices
work.description3: - Trained new employees on proper troubleshooting techniques
work.description4: - Worked independently and as part of a team to manage the IT needs of the financial branch of the company
work.description5: - Imaged and configured new and existing employee machines and offered program trainings for coworkers

work.title: Accounting Intern, Emeryville, CA
work.description1: - Reviewed and corrected asset expense invoices
work.description2: - Reviewed and presented quarterly reports for SEC and Jamba Board of Directors

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Naz must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
